title: Freddie Mercury's partner breaks silence on daughter hidden for 48 years
description: The Queen legend's former girlfriend has spoken out on the bombshell claims he fathered a lovechild
content:
A forthcoming book centred on Freddie Mercury's life is poised to send shockwaves through the entertainment world, revealing the existence of his secret daughter. The Queen frontman had a child who was kept well out of the public eye, with only his innermost circle, including his parents and sister being privy to the information. The Queen legend, who died in November 1991, aged 45, having publicly shared that he had AIDS shortly before was also openly bisexual. His ex-girlfriend and longtime friend Mary Austin has broken her silence on claims he had a secret child.

His ex-girlfriend and longtime friend Mary Austin has broken her silence. The book is expected to shock the entertainment world.
shortSummary: Frederick Mercury's ex-girlfriend Mary Austin confirmed his existence as she prepared to publish a biography, revealing he had a secret daughter.
argos_summary: A forthcoming book about Freddie Mercury reveals that the Queen frontman had a secret daughter, a fact known only to his close family and friends. The revelation comes from his ex-girlfriend Mary Austin, who has addressed the claims regarding Mercury's hidden child. Mercury, who passed away in 1991, was openly bisexual and had publicly shared his battle with AIDS shortly before his death.
